description: A program that reduces eyestrain produced by staring at a computer screen when working late hours
notes: A registry key has been added to update the computer's gamma range. This is needed to make the program work. Please restart your computer and make sure .NET Framework version 4.5.2 or later is installed to use this program. You need to start the program using the shortcut of the file LightBulb_Portable.bat in the folder of the program.
